welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subtitle: DaffaFznnn
welcome.content: My name is Daffa, {age} years old, living in Bandung. I want to be a backend-developer. My focus is to understand Node.js and Golang for backend development. Although I am proficient in JavaScript, I am ready to expand my knowledge in both languages.

content1.title: About me
content1.text: My full name is Muhammad Daffa Fauzan, I was born on December 4, 2005 in Bandung. I am the first child in my family, I also have one brother.

head.title: Contact

content.subtitle: Please feel free to ask me any questions or suggestions & criticisms
